reviewText: As a 19 month old toddler who loves all things Spot, I was very happy to hear that Spot was finally coming to DVD.  They have combined two VHS tapes into one DVD making it a great investment.  The episodes are the same but it is nice to have the quality restored and not to have to wait for the VCR to rewind between episodes.  I'm hoping Disney will release more Spot adventures to DVD soon, especially the Spot Visits His Grandparents episodes.

The two-year old reviewer in our household says 'mo' Spot peese'. She loves it which is great except for two minor problems:  She sobs every time the DVD is over, and ummm we're a wee bit tired of the stories having watched them twice a day since Christmas. :0)
Seriously, this is great for toddlers. Probably not for older preschoolers.
My son had this on VHS, and so we bought it for my daughter on DVD since we no longer have a VCR. My daughter loves it just as much as my son did.

My little grandaughter loves this movie. We play it over and over. A simple but sweet story for little one's. Arrived in perfect condition and quickly. Would not hesitate to buy from this seller again. Thanks, bmerry :)))
Calm, sweet, simple and happy viewing.  My austistic son's current fave and I don't mind a bit!

This is actually my second time purchasing this video. I had the VHS tape, but it was quickly worn out by my nieces and nephews when they visited. Now that I have a 20-month-old of my own, I'm happy to have Spot on dvd. Seriously, out of the 8 children that I know that has seen this video, they have ALL sat transfixed to the screen. It's amazing because the video is very "simplistic" in nature, but maybe that's why it's so great for toddlers. The music is nice and soothing, the stories are easy to follow and the kids all have loved that it's about a puppy. I would recommend this to any new parent! (It's actually rather relaxing for adults, too!)
It's a very good entertainment for childs under 3 years. My son Santiago enjoyed very much, and always ask to put the dvd again and again.
There is nothing wrong with this DVD.  Only we have VHS Spot's that are much better than this and look forward to some of the older Spot's to be released on DVD.  At least you get 2 shows.
